entity.name: Celtic - Lugh
entity.subtitle: The Many-Skilled, Shining One
entity.description: Master of all arts, champion of the Tuatha D√© Danann, god of light and sovereignty. Lugh is the divine exemplar of excellence - skilled in every craft and art, victorious in battle, wise in counsel, and radiant with supernatural light. His name means "shining" or "bright one," and he embodies the ideal of the complete hero-warrior-king.

relationships.allies: AllTuatha D√© Danann, particularly theDagda(adoptive or allied father figure),Nuada(the king who recognized his worth), Goibniu (the smith who forged his weapons)
relationships.enemies: The Fomorians (ancientenemies), especially Balor his grandfather, and Bres the tyrant king

family.parents: Cian (father, ofTuatha D√© Danann) and Ethniu (mother, daughter of Balor the Fomorian)
family.consorts: Multiple consorts in various tales; Deichtine (mother ofC√∫ Chulainnin some versions)
family.children: C√∫ Chulainn(in Ulster Cycle,Lughis his divine father, giving the hero his supernatural abilities)
family.siblings: Two brothers (killed by Balor as infants in some versions)

archetype.name: ‚òÄÔ∏è DIVINE CHAMPION / SOLAR HERO
archetype.description: Lugh embodies the Divine Champion archetype - master of all skills, bringer of light, and savior of his people.
